title: Shaun Bailey – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Shaun Bailey, the Conservative MP for West Bromwich West, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content: It’s a simple one for me. It’s time to #BringBackBoris [Johnson]. The members want him, he won the support of my communities and for the constituents I speak to, they want him back.
